Modules

 Holds configurations for Halos.

 Holds globals for Halos.
 Error Types
 Defines error types for Halos.
 Time - Halos System Ticks
 Manages Kernel Time of Halos (sysTick).
 Board Initialization
 Initializing of AVR AP7000 frequency and SDRAM.
 Process Manager
 Resource Manager
 System Call Handler
 System Call Handler manages all system calls from usermode to halOS (supervisormode).
 Virtual Memory Management
 Virtual Memory Management. The central communication point to other modules. Especially Process Loading and Unloading is supported from the module. Only the Memory Exceptions undergo this module border.
